text.base: The lobby smells of mildew and old cigarettes. The reception desk is covered in a layer of dust. Keys hang on the wall behind it, swinging slightly in a draft you can't feel.

lens.believer: Room 347's key is missing. The hook is shiny, as if recently used.
lens.skeptic: Squatters probably. The draft is coming from a broken window upstairs.
lens.haunted: You checked in here once. You never checked out.

inserts.text: For a second, the dust on the floor looks like ash.

guest_register.name: Guest Register
guest_register.description: The leather-bound book is open to October 1995.

interactions.read: The last entry is just scratching. It looks like a map.

choices.text: Sit in the lobby chair and rest.
